description: This Java class defines the WishlistItem entity, representing items on a user's wishlist, including attributes such as target price and timestamps, with annotations for database persistence.

classes.name: WishlistItem
classes.description: Entity class representing a wishlist item with associations to Wishlist and Product, and optional target price for notifications.

methods.name: WishlistItem()
methods.description: Protected default constructor for ORM use.

methods.name: WishlistItem(Wishlist wishlist, Product product)
methods.description: Constructor to create a new WishlistItem with specified wishlist and product.

methods.name: getId()
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the wishlist item.

methods.name: getTargetPrice()
methods.description: Returns the target price set for notification alerts.

methods.name: getAddedAt()
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the item was added.

methods.name: setTargetPrice(BigDecimal targetPrice)
methods.description: Sets the target price for notifications.
